title: Premate
author: Premate
content: Hi guys, im selling dc nitro 3 months link - BULK ORDER AVAILABLENote: You must not have an active Nitro subscription to activate Discord Nitro.Only new Discord subscribers can get 3 months of Nitro! If you were a Nitro, Nitro Classic subscriber (buyer) in the past, or had boosts, you wonÂ´t be able to apply the code, but you can share it with a friend! Can take some money for verification(will returned)All links made by me and all worked - no used. NO REFUNDSAfter purchasing this product, you will receive a link to activate DiscordDiscord Nitro 3 Months + 2 Boost + XBOX Game Pass Ultimate 2 Months : 0.3$How to Activate Discord Nitro?1 Enter the link we will give you.2 You will need to add a payment method. (You will not lose money. You can use a virtual card.)3 After confirming everything, you can manage the subscription from your account.4 You can get your XBOX Gamepass code from the Gift Settings section of your account.Payment Methods: Crypto ( LTC,ETH,USDT, etc. )Contact Me on Telegram: Contact me on telegram: https://t.me/prematexlQuoteA Discord Nitro subscription gives users access to the following features:* Installing an animated GIF avatar.* Ability to use animated emoji.* Ability to use custom emojis everywhere (if the user has the right to use external emoji on the server).* Maximum upload size changed from 8MB to 100MB or 50MB with Nitro Classic.* Ability to share the screen at 720p 60fps or 1080p 30fps.* Discord Nitro badge in profile.* Ability to change your discriminator. (Note: if your Nitro subscription expires, your discriminator will be randomly selected).* Server boost to give your favorite server exclusive bonuses and a cool badge.* Dedicated profile badge to show everyone that you support Discord.
